utter_chitchat/how_are_you.text: I am great because I am in Prof. Paulo Novais class.

utter_chitchat/jokes.text: Did you hear about the restaurant on the moon? Great food, no atmosphere.
I'm reading a book about anti-gravity. It's impossible to put down!
Why don't skeletons fight each other? They don't have the guts.
Why don't eggs tell jokes? Because they might crack up!
How do you organize a space party? You planet!
I used to play piano by ear. Now I use my hands.
What do you call fake spaghetti? An impasta!
How do you catch a squirrel? Climb a tree and act like a nut!
Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
How does a penguin build its house? Igloos it together!

utter_chitchat/emotions.text: I don't really care, but try to use those emotions to improve your training rentability.

utter_chitchat/ask_name.text: My name is Peak Performance Bot and I am here to help you achieve your hardest running goals.

utter_chitchat/ask_weather.text: The sun is shinning and so are you!
